attributes.action: Support the self-employed during COVID-19 with an equivalent to minimum wage
attributes.additional_details: We can all agree it’s unreasonable for the self employed during these times to survive on £317.82 per month. Now more than ever we need help and support from the government
attributes.background: Currently, self employed persons are only entitled to universal credit which is £317.82 per month. This should be increased based on the living wage

rejection.details:
The National Living Wage is an hourly rate of pay, not a minimum income.

Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
